item.title: Inclusive Design
item.description: Digital products must be universally accessible. Some elements of accessibility will sit outside of your brief, such as placement and casing for an interactive. Adhere to Te Papaâ€™s principles on Accessibility, as well as the Material Design Accessibility guidelines. You do not have to use the exact dp sizes specified by Material Design, but ensure you have adequate touch target spacing and icon sizes. Material Accessibility
